title: Bug 116786Library include should store relative path.
OB: i see that hte report design stores absolute path, we need to save relativepath.<propertyname="fileName"/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property<property name="namespace"lib1</property
EB: Bug 116786Library include should store relative path. When a library included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generatethe relative path, and save relative path.Example $project/test contains my report design.
SR: When a library included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generatethe relative path, and save relative path.Example $project/test contains my report design. now include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
